alert.note: Alert for Custer; Washita (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 11:11PM CDT until June 17 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Washita County in western Oklahoma... Custer County in western Oklahoma... * Until 1145 PM CDT. * At 1111 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles west of Custer City to near Dill City, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Weatherford, Clinton, Cordell, Burns Flat, Thomas, Arapaho, Dill City, Canute, Corn, Custer City, Butler, Bessie, Foss, Foss Reservoir, Cloud Chief, and Stafford. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
